question: On which date, the World Cartoonist's Day 2018 was celebrated?
explanation: The World Cartoonist's Day is celebrated every year on May 5 to honor all those creative ink-stained artists, past and present, the fascinating pieces they have created and the humor they have brought into our lives. The cartoonist's aim is always to sum up the most important news of the time in a cartoon which ultimately makes the reader sit up and take notice.
